Waiting for another player to join...
Wordopia é um jogo que testa sua rapidez: Wordopia is a game that tests your mental speed, creativity, and word skills. It's perfect for gathering friends and family around a table and enjoying moments of fun and healthy competition.
Wordopia é um jogo versátil que pode ser: Wordopia is a versatile game that can be adapted to different levels of difficulty and ages. It's perfect for children as it stimulates quick thinking and knowledge of alphabet letters. Additionally, it's also a challenge for adults who will need to think quickly and be creative to find suitable words within the chosen theme.
O objetivo do jogo é formar palavras usa: The objective of the game is to form words using the available letters before time runs out. The game consists of a series of buttons, each containing a letter of the alphabet. At the beginning of the game, a theme is chosen, such as 'animals' or 'foods'. In each round, a player must think of a word related to the theme and then select the corresponding letter on the board. The challenge is to find unique words and avoid repetitions as words used by previous players are blocked.
No entanto, aqui está o truque: o tempo: However, here's the trick: time is limited! A timer starts as soon as the theme is chosen, and players have only 10 seconds to think of a word, find it on the board, and press the corresponding letter. The time pressure adds an extra dose of adrenaline and excitement to the game, making it even more captivating.
Antes de começar o jogo, sorteie um tema: Before starting the game, randomly select a theme for the round by clicking the 'Generate New Theme' button
Certifique-se de que todos os jogadores: Make sure all players are aware of the chosen theme.
Um jogador começa a rodada clicando em u: A player starts the round by clicking on a letter and saying a word related to the theme that starts with the clicked letter. The clicked letter will be locked, and other players cannot use it again in the same round.
Após falar a palavra, o jogador deve cli: After saying the word, the player must click the red button, starting a 10-second timer and passing the turn to the next player.
O próximo jogador deve realizar as mesma: The next player must perform the same actions: click a letter, say a word, and click the button to pass the turn.
Se o timer chegar a 0, o jogador que não: If the timer reaches 0, the player who failed to click a letter and say a word will be eliminated from the round. When a player is eliminated, the system starts a 5-second timer and automatically passes the turn to the next player.
O jogador também pode ser eliminado se e: A player can also be eliminated if they say an answer that is not related to the theme and/or does not start with the selected letter.
Eventualmente, os jogadores vão sendo el: Eventually, players are eliminated from the round until only one player remains. This player will be the winner of the round, earning 1 point. When a player wins the round, the system will automatically draw a new theme. However, if all players agree, you can draw a new theme until one that pleases everyone is chosen.
Se todas as letras forem selecionadas pe: If all the letters are selected by the players and the winner of the round is not defined, the system will reset the selected letters and start the extra rounds, where players will now have to say two words for the same letter.
Se um dos jogadores clicar no botão sem: If one of the players clicks the button without following the rules, such as not being able to think of and say a word related to the theme, they can be eliminated by the other players. To do this, simply click the red button below the list of players, select the player to be eliminated, and then click 'Confirm'.
Lembre-se de consultar os outros jogador: Remember to consult the other players if someone should really be eliminated, as anyone can eliminate another player using this button.
O jogador que completar 3 pontos (vencer: The player who reaches 3 points (wins 3 rounds) will be the winner of the game.
As regras do Wordopia podem ser alterada: The rules of Wordopia can be changed and enhanced depending on the players, feel free to come up with new ideas, but remember that it is important to establish clear and fair rules before starting the game. Additionally, encourage interaction and friendly discussion among the players during the game to make the experience more fun and stimulating.
siteDescription: Tap, connect, and conquer in the online Tapple game. Test your word skills today!
Clique no botão abaixo e preencha o form: Click on the button below and fill out the form to help us keep improving the game
2- Clique em uma letra, fale uma palavra: 2- Click on a letter, say a word related to the topic that starts with the letter you clicked on
3- Clique no botão vermelho para passar: 3- Click on the red button to pass the turn to the next player
